Storm could batter coast; snow picture not clear

We could see beach erosion and coastal flooding, but meteorologist Dave Epstein doesn't expect major snowfall totals for areas within 30 miles of the coast. (10:40 a.m.)

Research: Healthy restaurant options good for you, business
